args.query: If f is differentiable at x0 then f(x0+h)-f(x0)-Df(x0) h = o(||h||)

args.content:
import Mathlib

open Filter Asymptotics

/--
Suppose f : E ‚Üí ‚Ñù is differentiable at x0. Then the error
|f(x0+h) - f(x0) - fderiv ‚Ñù f x0 h|
is bounded by ‚à•fderiv ‚Ñù f x0‚à• * ‚Äñh‚Äñ plus a smaller-order term as h ‚Üí 0.
Equivalently, there exists g = o(‚Äñh‚Äñ) such that
‚Äñf(x0+h) - f(x0) - fderiv ‚Ñù f x0 h‚Äñ ‚â§ ‚à•fderiv ‚Ñù f x0‚à• * ‚Äñh‚Äñ + g(h).
-/
theorem jirilebl_ra_ch_several_vars_ders_2621 {E : Type _} [NormedAddCommGroup E] [NormedSpace ‚Ñù E]
  (f : E ‚Üí ‚Ñù) (x0 : E) (hf : DifferentiableAt ‚Ñù f x0) :
  ‚àÉ g : E ‚Üí ‚Ñù, is_o g (fun h => ‚Äñh‚Äñ) (ùìù (0 : E)) ‚àß
    ‚àÄ h : E, ‚Äñf (x0 + h) - f x0 - fderiv ‚Ñù f x0 h‚Äñ ‚â§ ‚Äñ(fderiv ‚Ñù f x0)‚Äñ * ‚Äñh‚Äñ + g h := by sorry
